function ERU_EP04_13()
    -- .転-3【11月第4週】「無力な自分と過ぎゆく時間」
    SaveData.Title = "無力な自分と過ぎゆく時間"

    -- //BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ The start of the week. As expected, Hermes Himegami and Daria Himegami were absent from the academy. ]])

    MSG([[ However, other students who didn't know the circumstances said, "Those two must be busy," so it didn't cause any particular uproar. ]])

    MSG([[ It would also be troublesome if explaining the situation caused more confusion. So, I decided to invite only a select few close friends to gather in the boys' clubroom after school. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(100)

    -- //BG：男子部（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BU：リラ（驚き）、ヒユ（焦り）、オウガ（通常）、ウラン（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ After school arrived. ]])

    MSG([[ To everyone who gathered, I explained the series of incidents that happened over the weekend, carefully downplaying that Hermes is a person with a split personality. ]])

    MSG([[ Although everyone was clearly shocked by trusted Daria Himegami’s violent actions, they all listened carefully until the very end. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "...I see. So they used brute force to tear apart Minato and Lady Erika’s relationship. It seems the Himegami family holds some pretty dark secrets." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "If there’s anything I can do, I’ll help. But..." ]])

    MSG([[ However, the responses weren't encouraging. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0450.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "Sorry... I don't think I can help. I've always had a bad relationship with the 'Phoenix' Group, and my connections there are weak." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0978.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】悲しみ
 "The Ryuguuin family is the same. Among the 'Phoenix' Group, the Himegami family is particularly new and has built its own faction. Above all, they are one of the most secretive in the industry." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0979.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】悲しみ
 "I believe only those within the 'Phoenix' Group can obtain solid information." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1349.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ
 "I see." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Both leads fell through, and I couldn’t hide my disappointment. ]])

    MSG([[ I see. On second thought, that makes perfect sense. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though they’re part of the same six major corporate groups, it doesn’t mean someone like Ouga-kun and Uran-san are well connected. ]])

    MSG([[ After all, if I don't find students whose families belong to companies related to the 'Phoenix' Group, I won't get any information. ]])

    MSG([[ But among the students I’m friends with, I’ve never heard of anyone related to the Phoenix Group. ]])

    MSG([[ This is going to be quite a tough task. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1350_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ
 "Unfortunately... it doesn't look like we'll get any useful information. There’s no way we'll just conveniently find someone connected to the Phoenix Group." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "Huh? What are you talking about, Minato? You know well enough, don't you?" ]])

    MSG([[ At my words, Ouga gave me a puzzled look. I didn’t understand what he meant. ]])

    MSG([[ Who was he referring to? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "Look, right behind you, the heirs of the Phoenix Group are itching to give you the right answer." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1351.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】焦り
 "Wha—!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Turning around, I saw—indeed, people I knew well. ]])

    MSG([[ What!? No way, these people are— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0120.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】通常
 "Let us introduce ourselves once again!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01ma")
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0121.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】興奮
 "I am the heir of Phoenix Bookstore—<r=ほうおういん>Hououin</r><r=ぶんがく>Bungaku</r>." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#2】興奮
 "I am the heir of Phoenix Films—Hououin<r=えいが>Eika</r>." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0122.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#3】興奮
 "I'm the hidden child of the chairman of Phoenix TV... Hououin<r=あさひ>Asahi</r>." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0122.wav")
    MSG([[
    【#1】興奮
 "We are all related to the 'Phoenix' Group!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1352.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】焦り
 "Whaaaaaaaaaaat!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    --WAIT_INPUT(1000)
    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_14")
end
